user.name: Hussain Zaidi
user.bio: Computer Science undergrad at University of Pennsylvania

node.name: ScholarStreets
node.description: ScholarStreets is a comprehensive platform designed to assist users, especially parents, in finding suitable schools, neighborhoods, and homes. Leveraging educational data and housing information, ScholarStreets provides tailored recommendations to meet the diverse needs of users.

node.name: Penn-Course-Information-System
node.description: Penn Course Information System is designed to provide students with a comprehensive tool to navigate and explore the courses offered at the University of Pennsylvania. It offers several features to simplify the course selection process and help students make informed decisions.

node.name: investment-calculator-react
node.description: This is an investment calculator built using React which allows users to input their current savings, yearly contribution, interest rate, and investment duration to calculate the investment results for each year.

node.name: music-player
node.description: Music player project created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It offers users a responsive and minimalist interface to browse and play a pre-installed collection of songs. Dynamically creates song cards from metadata and allows users to play a song and with a simple click

node.name: joke-and-talk
node.description: Joke and Talk is a fun and creative project that offers a unique two-fold functionality: it generates jokes through a Joke API and converts them into speech using the Speech Synthesis API. In addition, it also serves as a text-to-speech app, allowing users to input any text and hear it spoken aloud in different voices, accents, and languages.

node.name: tweetable-quote-generator
node.description: The Quote Generator is a powerful tool that enables users to generate and tweet inspiring quotes with just one click. The program utilizes Jacinto Quotes API and Twitter Web Intent.
